revised_title: Advances in Polymer Fuel Cell Technology for Electrochemical Power Systems
tldr: This article discusses recent developments and applications of the polymer fuel cell for electrochemical power systems. It explores the potential efficiency and environmental benefits of fuel-cell-powered hybrid electric vehicles, as well as the challenges and advancements in fuel cell technology, such as electrolytes, fuels, and fuel handling methods.
